decision_conditions: <p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">Prior to the commencement of the relevant part of the work, the applicant shall submit, and have approved in writing by the Local Planning Authority, full detailed specification of the sustainable urban drainage system and flood resistance/resilience measures supported by appropriate calculations, construction details, drainage layout and a site specific management and maintenance plan where applicable. The surface water management and flood resistance/resilience measures shall be implemented according to the proposal referred to in the Flood Risk Assessment (Ref: 6277 Final v1.0) and any subsequent details approved.</p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">REASON: In the interests of preventing flooding on site and in the surrounding area.</p>

<p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">All new materials in respect of all the works hereby approved (and any other incidental works to be carried out in this connection) shall match the existing building in respect of materials used, detailed execution and finished appearance unless otherwise shown on the hereby approved plans.</p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);"><br></p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">REASON: To ensure the development integrates with the host building and the surrounding conservation area.</p>

<p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">The Development hereby permitted shall only be carried out and completed strictly in accordance with the submitted plans hereby approved and any subsequent approval of details.</p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);"><br></p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51);">REASON: To ensure that the development hereby permitted is carried out in full accordance with the plans hereby approved.</p>

<p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">The development hereby permitted must be begun not later than the expiration of three years beginning with the date of this permission.</p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);"><br></p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);"></p><p style="color: rgb(51, 51, 51); background-color: rgb(245, 245, 245);">REASON: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).</p>

constraints_details.constraints_layer_description: A4D Storage and distribution to residential

description: Non-material amendment to planning permission 2021/0858 granted on 05/07/2022 for the erection of part single part two storey rear extension at lower ground and ground levels to provide additional living accommodation to existing flats and associated works.The non-material amendment involves:Opening of the side entrance to the lower ground floor flat and layout change
